_xResult.title: A Galaxy Bursts Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made reversible linen jacket with bold design
_xResult.longdesc:
Oh you said you wouldn't fall in love again, did you now? This stunning jacket may change your mind. Reversible and unique custom made jacket from Aiste of Lithuania will make you wonder why everything you own isn't made by her.  And no doubt romance will be on your and everyone's mind when you stride into the room. You cannot help but impress.

 

Pick two colors or go with the red/black combo pictured. The high quality handmade jacket is completely reversible and is made of flax linen and wool. Embroidered patten is unique for each jacket. Matched piping on sleeve and edge, string tie closure. Seasonless so you can wear it year round.

 

Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Another technique that I use is a distinctive, never-to-be-repeated embroidered "artscape" onto fabric which is then sewn into jackets and coats. Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing is needed before you wear this garment."

 

Custom made to any measurements. As with all jackets, you will receive a more precision fit if you provide more comprehensive upper body measurements and sleeve measurements in your Balodana fit profile.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
